entry.title: Game: Tabletop Simulator - Kingdom Death: Monster (Board, 2016) (2)
entry.content:
Game: Tabletop Simulator - Kingdom Death: Monster (Board, 2016) (2)20171226
I spent about forty minutes reading about what to do next. I'm
trying to decide whether to fight a level 1 or a level 2 White
Lion next.

--

I decided to go with a level two. I'm very nervous, but I lucked
out during the hunt. I got Clean Water (bonus), Lion's Sculpture
(bonus), Frozen Lightning (one person got hurt, Arya), then I was
ambushed in the Sea of Golden Grass. I'm glad to have been
ambushed though, because it means fewer Hunt Events to get hurt
during. I got quite a lot of interesting terrain, too.

So, next time I play, I'll have to deal with the actual
Showdown. Eeeee! It's cool how exciting it is.

Total time: 3:34
  • Video Games
  • Tabletop Simulator - Kingdom Death: Monster
  • Board
  • 2016

entry.title: Game: Tabletop Simulator - Kingdom Death: Monster (Board, 2016)
entry.content:
Game: Tabletop Simulator - Kingdom Death: Monster (Board, 2016)20171225
I'm actually playing this with Tabletop Simulator, and I think I
don't have the 1.5 rules, but I'm not totally sure.

I decided to name my characters after people in Final Fantasy, but
then decided to change it to Game of Thrones when I had to name my
settlement.

I messed up the board trying to UNDO something. D'oh!

I played for almost two and a half hours and did the first fight
and the settlement phase. It was really intense, but I'm getting
very familiar with how TTS works, as well as KDM. It is really
cool!

Total time: 2:24
  • Video Games
  • Tabletop Simulator - Kingdom Death: Monster
  • Board
  • 2016

entry.title: Game of Thrones - Season 2 - Episode 5 - The Ghost of Harrenhal (4)
entry.content:
Game of Thrones - Season 2 - Episode 5 - The Ghost of Harrenhal (4)20171225
This was another big death, because it is very
unpredictable. Renly seems like a big player. Tyrion is amazing
in this episode. I love how much we learn about Arya as well. The
best part, of course, was Jon and Bran getting closer to their
destinies. I did like what happened with Dany... she finally
doesn't look super dirty.
  • TV Shows
  • Game of Thrones

entry.title: Game: Lara Croft GO (Steam, 2016) (2)
entry.content:
Game: Lara Croft GO (Steam, 2016) (2)20171224
I finished the game today. The Fire Cave was really hard and the
Mirror one was mind-bending. I really enjoyed the mirror
levels. Some of the hard levels were too much trial-and-error
though because you couldn't predict what a switch was going to do
and you only had one chance to do it right. That was really
annoying. This is a neat game!

Total time: 6:29
  • Video Games
  • Lara Croft GO
  • Steam
  • 2016

entry.title: Game: Pushmo (3DS, 2011)
entry.content:
Game: Pushmo (3DS, 2011)20171224
I played about half-way through the first set of murals. This is a
really clever game. I like how it teaches you a skill and then you
start executing on it and "seeing" the solutions so quickly, like
it was an intuitive thing to do all along.

entry.title: Game: Final Fantasy 10 2 (HD Remaster) (PS3, 2014)
entry.content:
Game: Final Fantasy 10 2 (HD Remaster) (PS3, 2014)20171221
I started this today and had quite a blast playing it. It was hard
to find the ciphers on the beach but it was fun to walk around
fighting fiends along the way. The style of the game is very silly
and I like that a lot. There are a lot of things I don't
understand yet though. For example, I can't tell if I am leveling
up my characters or just particular dress spheres.

Total time: 1:45
  • Video Games
  • Final Fantasy 10 2 (HD Remaster)
  • PS3
  • 2014
